snippet: As throngs of police officers drew their weapons and pursued a man with a large knife down 7th Avenue and then shot him to death, many bystanders stopped to watch, record video and take photos.
abstract: As throngs of police officers drew their weapons and pursued a man with a large knife down 7th Avenue and then shot him to death, many bystanders stopped to watch, record video and take photos.

byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and AARON EDWARDS

headline.main: Police Shoot Man in Midtown, and Tourists Reach for Cameras
